subject: Hockey, Ice
Aviation Accidents and Safety
Deaths (Fatalities)
Series
lead_paragraph: The effort continues to rebuild Yaroslavl Lokomotiv, the elite Russian hockey team whose players, coaches and support staff were killed in a plane crash in September.
snippet: The effort continues to rebuild Yaroslavl Lokomotiv, the elite Russian hockey team whose players, coaches and support staff were killed in a plane crash in September.
